channel.title: Cache downloading to the wrong spot
channel.description:
Allright so i start the client and it downloads cache, Thing is it download the cache to the root of the client files, its supposed to download to C:/. The thing is that once its done downloading it, the client searches for the cache in C:/ which it cant find because it never placed it there... How do i fix this..?
@@@SOLVED! HAD TO COMPILE THE FOLDER WHERE SIGNLINK.JAVA WAS.@@@
